targets.expr: min((ccp_backrest_last_incr_backup_time_since_completion_seconds{pg_cluster="[[cluster]]"} + on(job,instance) group_left() (ccp_is_in_recovery_status == 2)) or (ccp_backrest_last_diff_backup_time_since_completion_seconds{pg_cluster="[[cluster]]"} + on(job,instance) group_left() (ccp_is_in_recovery_status == 2)) or (ccp_backrest_last_full_backup_time_since_completion_seconds{pg_cluster="[[cluster]]"} + on(job,instance) group_left() (ccp_is_in_recovery_status == 2)))

sum by (state) (pg_stat_activity_count{pg_cluster="[[cluster]]",pod=~"[[pod]]",datname=~"[[datname]]",state="idle in transaction"}) or sum by (state) (ccp_pg_stat_activity_count{pg_cluster="[[cluster]]",pod=~"[[pod]]",datname=~"[[datname]]",state="idle in transaction"})
